title: John Lithgow | Vlad Habits
description:
Stephen’s namesake Alaskan fat bear was the victim of election fraud, and Vladimir Putin’s hackers temporarily took down several U.S. airport websites in retaliation for America’s support for Ukraine. And Rudy Giuliani takes time out from busking in Times Square to catch up with Stephen about his many legal and financial problems. In unrelated news, John Lithgow joins us next live in the studio! Our dear friend returns to The Late Show to talk about his latest role as director of a Broadway show, and confesses that he’s worked with some sub-par directors throughout his career. Stick around for more with John Lithgow and find tickets to his show, “Everything’s Fine,” available at http://www.everythingsfineplay.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
